Hi,

If you use WUI, you may add 

org.archive.crawler.filter.URIRegExpFilter on the Filter page

(Scope->exclude-filter), go to Setting page, use a regular 

expression such as "(?i).*screenreferralhomepage\.do\?.*" for 

the URI reg filter, and set "if-match-return" as false. Then 

the crawler will exclude those files you don't need before it 

conducts the pre-fetch-processing. I think it is a quite 

effecient way to exclude files. It works well in my 

experiments.

Good luck,
Yan
